Name: Pear & Elderflower Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of pear slice on rim (& pegged elderflower bouquet when in season).
Review: With its blend of gin and vodka this fruity floral Martini is entering Vesper territory.
History: Created in February 2020 by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Pear & Elderflower Martini contains 152 calories
